text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo COVID-19 is in the White House despite having almost unlimited resources to clean and sanitize and the best security on the planet plus daily testing while many Americans can't get tested at all - how come no one is wearing a mask?  @realDonaldTrump is criminally stupid @nytimes
